title: We always try to use latest tecnology
desc: Medical technology has come a long way since the invention of eyeglasses and the stethoscope. The broader availability of mobile internet, the expansion of a more affluent middle class

title: Our success at the time of Covid-19
desc: Since the start of the coronavirus pandemic, many countries have deployed.Here you can read some of their success stories, focusing on local innovations and support from the global DHIS2 community

title: Our consideration of Poor patient
desc: We always try to consider the poor patient, We provide them less charge for bed and for other atuff also. We give them free madicine.Last year we have given a huse amount of free madice in our nerest village.
